definition: (out of) the corner of one's eyes/peripheral vision/residual light/light of the setting sun
extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
surname Yu
variant of 餘|余[yu2], remainder
light/ray/CL:道[dao4]/bright/only/merely/to use up

sentences.english: I was sitting in my office and saw it out of the corner of my eye.
sentences.chinese: 我正坐在辦公室裏，c從眼角餘光發現了它。

sentences.english: Out of the corner of my eye, I saw a baby playing with rattles on my mother’s bed.
sentences.chinese: 我眼角餘光看到一個小孩在媽媽的牀上玩撥浪鼓。

sentences.english: Thus peripheral vision is up to the non-treated eye.
sentences.chinese: 因此，餘光是由那一隻沒有接受治療的眼睛來提供的。

sentences.english: From the corner of his eyes, Jack saw a flash outside the window. Hensley saw it, too.
sentences.chinese: 傑克眼角的餘光瞥到窗外有道閃光，漢斯萊也看見了。

sentences.english: I don’t think they know my peripheral vision extends to the door.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲他們不知道我的餘光看到了他們。

sentences.english: The sun is starting to set, turning cloud wisps neon red in the dimming light.
sentences.chinese: 太陽就要落下去了，餘光將雲微微的變成紅色。

sentences.english: And out of the corner of your eye, you see enemy planes approaching.
sentences.chinese: 你餘光一掃，發現數架敵機正向你逼近。

sentences.english: But in the corner of your sight, my bashfulness is hardly to ignore.
sentences.chinese: 但在你眼角的餘光裏，卻是難以忽視的靦腆。

sentences.english: Your eyes will catch those first and last words too, by using something called the peripheral vision.
sentences.chinese: 用眼睛的餘光你會看到開頭和結尾的幾個字。

sentences.english: I turned out to get a scan.
sentences.chinese: 我熟視無睹地拿餘光一掃而過。

definition: to flicker or flash
overwhelmed with shock, horror or amazement/dumbstruck/aghast
glistening teardrops
to be shocked/to be appalled/to be terrified
halo/(photography) halation
to deride/to mock
to flicker/to flash on and off/to brighten and fade
bewildered
(of time) to pass quickly/to be fleeting
Kaiyuan county level city in Honghe Hani and Yi autonomous prefecture, Yunnan
lit. crow and peacock make no sound/absolute silence (idiom); not a single voice can be heard/absolute silence
not a sound to be heard (idiom)
wisps of blood/visible veins/(of eyes) bloodshot
mutter
to flit across/to sweep past/to glance (strike at an angle)
candle flame
